stats.name: Animals Bred
stats.description: The number of times the player bred two mobs.

stats.name: Armor Pieces Cleaned
stats.description: The number of dyed leather armors washed with a cauldron.

stats.name: Banners Cleaned
stats.description: The number of banner patterns washed with a cauldron.

stats.name: Barrels Opened
stats.description: The number of times the player has opened a Barrel.

stats.name: Bells Rung
stats.description: The number of times the player has rung a Bell.

stats.name: Cake Slices Eaten
stats.description: The number of cake slices eaten.

stats.name: Cauldrons Filled
stats.description: The number of times the player filled cauldrons with water buckets.

stats.name: Chests Opened
stats.description: The number of times the player opened chests.

stats.name: Damage Absorbed
stats.description: The amount of damage the player has absorbed in tenths of 1.

stats.name: Damage Blocked By Shield
stats.description: The amount of damage the player has blocked with a shield in tenths of 1.

stats.name: Damage Dealt
stats.description: The amount of damage the player has dealt in tenths of 1. Includes only melee attacks.

stats.name: Damage Dealt (Absorbed)
stats.description: The amount of damage the player has dealt that were absorbed, in tenths of 1.

stats.name: Damage Dealt (Resisted)
stats.description: The amount of damage the player has dealt that were resisted, in tenths of 1.

stats.name: Damage Resisted
stats.description: The amount of damage the player has resisted in tenths of 1.

stats.name: Damage Taken
stats.description: The amount of damage the player has taken in tenths of 1.

stats.name: Dispensers Searched
stats.description: The number of times interacted with dispensers.

stats.name: Distance Climbed
stats.description: The total distance traveled up ladders or vines.

stats.name: Distance Crouched
stats.description: The total distance walked while sneaking.

stats.name: Distance Fallen
stats.description: The total distance fallen, excluding jumping. If the player falls more than one block, the entire jump is counted.

stats.name: Distance Flown
stats.description: Distance traveled upwards and forwards at the same time, while more than one block above the ground.

stats.name: Distance Sprinted
stats.description: The total distance sprinted.

stats.name: Distance Swum
stats.description: The total distance covered with sprint-swimming.

stats.name: Distance Walked
stats.description: The total distance walked.

stats.name: Distance Walked on Water
stats.description: The distance covered while bobbing up and down over water.

stats.name: Distance Walked under Water
stats.description: The total distance you have walked underwater.

stats.name: Distance by Boat
stats.description: The total distance traveled by boats.

stats.name: Distance by Elytra
stats.description: The total distance traveled by elytra.

stats.name: Distance by Horse
stats.description: The total distance traveled by horses.

stats.name: Distance by Minecart
stats.description: The total distance traveled by minecarts.

stats.name: Distance by Pig
stats.description: The total distance traveled by pigs via saddles.

stats.name: Distance by Strider
stats.description: The total distance traveled by striders via saddles.

stats.name: Droppers Searched
stats.description: The number of times interacted with droppers.

stats.name: Ender Chests Opened
stats.description: The number of times the player opened ender chests.

stats.name: Fish Caught
stats.description: The number of fish caught.

stats.name: Games Quit
stats.description: The number of times "Save and quit to title" has been clicked.

stats.name: Hoppers Searched
stats.description: The number of times interacted with hoppers.

stats.name: Interactions with Anvil
stats.description: The number of times interacted with anvils.

stats.name: Interactions with Beacon
stats.description: The number of times interacted with beacons.

stats.name: Interactions with Blast Furnace
stats.description: The number of times interacted with Blast Furnaces.

stats.name: Interactions with Brewing Stand
stats.description: The number of times interacted with brewing stands.

stats.name: Interactions with Campfire
stats.description: The number of times interacted with Campfires.

stats.name: Interactions with Cartography Table
stats.description: The number of times interacted with Cartography Tables.

stats.name: Interactions with Crafting Table
stats.description: The number of times interacted with crafting tables.

stats.name: Interactions with Furnace
stats.description: The number of times interacted with furnaces.

stats.name: Interactions with Grindstone
stats.description: The number of times interacted with Grindstones.

stats.name: Interactions with Lectern
stats.description: The number of times interacted with Lecterns.

stats.name: Interactions with Loom
stats.description: The number of times interacted with Looms.

stats.name: Interactions with Smithing Table
stats.description: The number of times interacted with Smithing Tables.

stats.name: Interactions with Smoker
stats.description: The number of times interacted with Smokers.

stats.name: Interactions with Stonecutter
stats.description: The number of times interacted with Stonecutters.

stats.name: Items Dropped
stats.description: The number of items dropped. This does not include items dropped upon death. If a group of items are dropped together, eg a stack of 64, it only counts as 1.

stats.name: Items Enchanted
stats.description: The number of items enchanted.

stats.name: Jumps
stats.description: The total number of jumps performed.

stats.name: Mob Kills
stats.description: The number of mobs the player killed.

stats.name: Music Discs Played
stats.description: The number of music discs played on a jukebox.

stats.name: Note Blocks Played
stats.description: The number of note blocks hit.

stats.name: Note Blocks Tuned
stats.description: The number of times interacted with note blocks.

stats.name: Number of Deaths
stats.description: The number of times the player died.

stats.name: Plants Potted
stats.description: The number of plants potted onto flower pots.

stats.name: Player Kills
stats.description: The number of players the player killed (on PvP servers). Indirect kills do not count.

stats.name: Raids Triggered
stats.description: The number of times the player has triggered a Raid.

stats.name: Raids Won
stats.description: The number of times the player has won a Raid.

stats.name: Shulker Boxes Cleaned
stats.description: The number of times the player has washed a Shulker Box with a cauldron.

stats.name: Shulker Boxes Opened
stats.description: The number of times the player has opened a Shulker Box.

stats.name: Sneak Time
stats.description: The time the player has held down the sneak button (tracked in ticks).

stats.name: Talked to Villagers
stats.description: The number of times interacted with villagers (opened the trading GUI).

stats.name: Targets Hit
stats.description: The number of times the player has shot a target block.

stats.name: Time Played
stats.description: The total amount of time played (tracked in ticks). If the game is paused this number ceases to increase. If "5.50 h" is displayed this means that you have played for 5 hours and 30 minutes (not 50 minutes).

stats.name: Time Since Last Death
stats.description: The time since the player's last death (tracked in ticks).

stats.name: Time Since Last Rest
stats.description: The time since the player's last rest (tracked in ticks). If this value is greater than 1.00 h, phantoms can spawn.

stats.name: Time with World Open
stats.description: The total amount of time the world was opened (tracked in ticks). Unlike Play Time, if the game is paused this number continues to increase.

stats.name: Times Slept in a Bed
stats.description: The number of times the player has slept in a bed.

stats.name: Traded with Villagers
stats.description: The number of times traded with villagers.

stats.name: Trapped Chests Triggered
stats.description: The number of times the player opened trapped chests.

stats.name: Water Taken from Cauldron
stats.description: The number of times the player took water from cauldrons with glass bottles.
